mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 1

SELECT M.USER_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, POSITION_NAME, E.USER_NAME, M.USER_NAME, M.USER_ID, M.USER_PWD, M.EMAIL, M.SALARY, M.BONUS, M.PHONE, M.GENDER, M.ADDRESS, M.CREATE_DATE, M.IMAGE_CHANGE, M.IMAGE_ORIGIN, M.BIRTHDAY AS BIRTHDAY, M.STATUS AS STATUS FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN BUSINESS ON M.BUSINESS_NO = BUSINESS.BUSINESS_NO LEFT JOIN POSITION ON M.POSITION_NO = POSITION.POSITION_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER E ON M.USER_NO = E.USER_NO WHERE M.STATUS = 1
SELECT * FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN BUSINESS USING (BUSINESS_NO) LEFT JOIN POSITION USING (POSITION_NO) WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND POSITION_NAME = 'B_점장' AND BUSINESS.STATUS = 1

SELECT m.USER_NO AS userNo, m.USER_ID AS userId, m.USER_NAME AS userName, m.EMAIL, m.PHONE, m.GENDER, m.POSITION_NO AS positionNo, p.POSITION_NAME AS positionName, m.BUSINESS_NO AS businessNo, m.SALARY, m.CREATE_DATE AS enrollDate, m.STATUS AS status, COALESCE(h.headName, '없음') AS headName FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN POSITION p ON m.POSITION_NO = p.POSITION_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT mm.BUSINESS_NO, mm.USER_NAME AS headName FROM MEMBER mm WHERE mm.POSITION_NO = 6 ) h ON m.BUSINESS_NO = h.BUSINESS_NO WHERE m.USER_NAME = #{userName} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT SUM(SELL_MONEY) FROM SELL WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AND STATUS = 1

SELECT CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(UPDATE_AT, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') THEN 1 WHEN TO_CHAR(UPDATE_AT, 'YYYY-MM') < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') THEN 0 END AS STATUS FROM BUSINESS WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT BUSINESS_NO, BUSINESS_NAME FROM BUSINESS WHERE STATUS = 1
SELECT UPDATE_AT FROM BUSINESS WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo} AND STATUS = 1
